channel.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
channel.description:
## This is a thread for discussing FoL classes and changes/additions and stuff
## Before suggesting anything, remember to check the [proper official class cards thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-clean-with-no-talking/1998) for all info on classes

item.description:

item.source: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies

item.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
IDEAS: (Regarding the Mass claim problem.)
The Butler - Nightshade Wine - The King will not be informed of his poisoning until the night begins.
The Psychic - Change Telepathy to only target 1 player (effectively makes it an anonymous whisper.) Increase it’s number of uses to 4.

I also agree with the scum day chat idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies

item.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
Give scum day chat. Doesn’t disrupt anything but allows them to plan and counter fake claims far easier. Super easy to do. Play a few games like that and if they are still up tweak a few things mechanically, but I think a daychat should he enough for most intelligent scum.

Read full topic
item.source: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies

item.description:
Nah, as we need to be allowed to claim… the reason cult will (probably) lose pestilence isn’t because of the mass claim, it’s because their claims were weak. Admittedly, the mass claim maybe accelerated it, but…

It should be natural not to massclaim due to all the mechanics

item.description:
Well, at least in my suggestion qnyway, they aren’t free. Sure, its more than they would otherwise get, but it still:

  • has inherent risk
  • rewards/required skill being put into action

item.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
I think Evils should gain the ability that if they can guess 3 people’s roles, they can kill all 3.
As that’ll significantly hinder massclaims.
We need something to disincentivise claiming for free win.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-archer-bd-the-skirmisher-un/3007

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-drainer-and-the-ghoul/9256

The Archer is BD killer-type that acts like Vig and buff to eliminate even classes with night immunity but it’s downside is that killing fellow BD will get you to commit suicide.

The Skirmisher is converted Archer and compared to Assassin that uses Nightshade to next level, the effect of poison won’t let the victim know until next day that make look appear they died in their sleep and protect the unseen from other sources. The Skirmisher won’t turn into Assassin so the new converted member can keep their abilities until Skirmisher dies, technically they can kill at same rate as Assassin but limited.
True silent killer.

The Drainer is unique Neutral Offensive and have rather interesting agenda, the goal is surviving to see good and evil factions lose by taking away their limited ability uses and more so for Royal Blood passive classes and that doesn’t stop them from using the ability nor will The Drainer get caught at sight, their only choice is to win with the Neutral Killer and other third party classes, including The Ghoul.

The Ghoul is selected by The Drainer and that means they must secretly conspire against once-known-allies, this Neutral Investigative do notify their master with not one but two classes wherabouts regarding passive immunity and the feedback what the player did towards the other player and vice versa.

Read full topic
item.source: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies

item.title: Class Discussion and Ideas for Forum of Lies
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Suggestion for a class to be added for FOL:

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-mystic-bd-and-seer-unseen/35490

It’s complexity won’t be a problem for people on the forums, but if there is any new faction I might need to make a new class for it. Just point it out if anything needs adding. Would love for this to be tested into the next FOL game or something.

Jammy insta add this class or I will ban you from my minecraft and Roblox server

Read full topic

item.description:
